name: @nodevisor/root
description: Server Management and Scalable Application Deployment

scripts.test:debian: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/workspace -w /workspace debian:latest /bin/bash -c 'apt-get update && apt-get install -y build-essential curl && curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | bash - && apt-get install -y nodejs && npm install && npm run build && SAFE=true DEBUG=nodevisor* npm test'
scripts.test:ubuntu: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/workspace -w /workspace ubuntu:latest /bin/bash -c 'apt-get update && apt-get install -y build-essential curl && curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | bash - && apt-get install -y nodejs && npm install && npm run build && SAFE=true DEBUG=nodevisor* npm test'
scripts.test:centos: docker run --rm --dns 8.8.8.8 --dns 8.8.4.4 -v $(pwd):/workspace -w /workspace centos:7 /bin/bash -c 'yum update -y && yum groupinstall -y "Development Tools" && yum install -y curl && curl -fsSL https://rpm.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | bash - && yum install -y nodejs && npm install && npm run build && SAFE=true DEBUG=nodevisor* npm test'
scripts.test:fedora: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/workspace -w /workspace fedora:latest /bin/bash -c 'dnf update -y && dnf groupinstall -y "Development Tools" && dnf install -y curl && curl -fsSL https://rpm.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | bash - && dnf install -y nodejs && npm install && npm run build && SAFE=true DEBUG=nodevisor* npm test'
